snippet: To the Editor:    Your May 20 front-page article on the California governor's race correctly observed that movements intended to democratize California politics had the effect of making a candidacy like that of Al Checchi, who has spent $30 millio...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Your May 20 front-page article on the California governor's race correctly observed that movements intended to democratize California politics had the effect of making a candidacy like that of Al Checchi, who has spent $30 million of his own money, ''all but inevitable.''
abstract: Letter by California US Repr Mel Levine says May 20 front-page article on California governor's race correctly observed that movements intended to democratize California politics had effect of making candidacy like that of Al Checchi all but inevitable (S)
